siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: We help GI clinics improve outcomes by sending patients information to their phones. For example, we send colonoscopy patients instructions that help them arrive prepared.
blogPost.body: We help GI clinics improve outcomes by sending patients information to their phones. For example, we send colonoscopy patients instructions that help them arrive prepared.
blogPost.title: Gradia Health - Handcrafted healthcare information sent to patients' phones
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 我们通过向患者发送信息到他们的手机上，帮助消化道诊所改善结果。例如，我们向结肠镜检查患者发送说明，帮助他们做好准备。
localize.tagline: 手工制作的医疗信息发送到患者的手机上

localize.description: 我們通過向患者發送信息到他們的手機上，幫助消化道診所改善結果。例如，我們向結腸鏡檢查患者發送說明，幫助他們做好準備。
localize.tagline: 手工製作的醫療信息發送到患者的手機上

previous.excerpt: Helps translate phrases, words, and idioms in context with examples in English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Italian. Learn languages more effectively with phrases translated into the context of sentences.
previous.title: Eltra.context - Translate sentences, words, idioms in context with examples

localize.description: 帮助翻译短语、单词和成语，并提供英语、俄语、德语、法语、西班牙语和意大利语的例子。通过将短语翻译成句子的上下文，更有效地学习语言。
localize.tagline: 在上下文中翻译句子、词语、成语，并举例说明。

localize.description: 幫助翻譯短語、單詞和成語，並提供英語、俄語、德語、法語、西班牙語和意大利語的例子。通過將短語翻譯成句子的上下文，更有效地學習語言。
localize.tagline: 在上下文中翻譯句子、詞語、成語，並舉例說明。
